name: Asset
description: At Asset Chain, we’re unlocking a tokenized global economy where every asset is on-chain, driving freedom and financial inclusion for all. Asset Chain focuses on the Real-World Asset Industry. The goal of Asset Chain is to bring every asset on-chain driving freedom and financial inclusion for all Asset Chain is a Layer 1 EVM-compatible blockchain that runs on Lachesis proof-of-stake consensus mechanism with horizontal scaling ability. Asset Chain can process up to 20,000 transactions concurrently and has a block finality of 1 second. Asset Chain validator nodes will be tokenized to allow anyone anywhere to own a part of these nodes and share the validator rewards. This improves decentralization and security of the blockchain as well as increases liquidity on the blockchain Asset Chain’s design allows a maximum amount of fee per block and this ensures that no matter the traffic on-chain, fees are low . Asset Chain fees are cheaper than other L1s and L2s.
